canvasJSON:
<mxGraphModel>
  <root>
    <mxCell id="0"/>
    <mxCell id="1" parent="0"/>
    <mxCell id="public_network" value="<h5 class="no-selection">public_network</h5>" style="shape=cloud" parent="1" vertex="1" type="Network" name="public_network">
      <mxGeometry x="720" y="210" width="160" height="140" as="geometry">
        <mxRectangle width="120" height="40" as="alternateBounds"/>
      </mxGeometry>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="blackhat_server_1" value="<h5 id="toptitle" class="no-selection" style="margin:0px;">blackhat_server_1</h5><br><img src="assets/docker_image_icons/host.png" width="48" height="48">" parent="1" vertex="1" connectable="0" type="NetworkElement" name="blackhat_server_1">
      <mxGeometry x="370" y="60" width="150" height="140" as="geometry">
        <mxRectangle width="120" height="40" as="alternateBounds"/>
      </mxGeometry>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="2" style="port;image=/editors/images/ethernet.png;align=right;imageAlign=right;spacingRight=18" parent="blackhat_server_1" vertex="1" type="Interface" name="blackhat_server_1">
      <mxGeometry y="0.25" width="16" height="16" relative="1" as="geometry">
        <mxPoint x="-6" y="-8" as="offset"/>

addctf.description: Add a ctf in /home/<username> directory inside a secret file
addctf.name: addctf

addrootctf.description: Add a ctf in /root directory inside a secret file
addrootctf.name: addrootctf

allow_url_include.description: Set allow url include to On
allow_url_include.name: allow_url_include

create_db.description: Create a new db, insert a name for new db
create_db.name: create_db

sed.description: Replace a string with another inside a file
sed.name: sed

sql_to_db.description: Execute a sql file into a db (you must load a sql file in container first! )
sql_to_db.name: sql_to_db

start_apache_debug.description: Start web server in debug mode (all errors reported)
start_apache_debug.name: start_apache_debug
